Personally, it took many years and some colorful professional career guidance’ to discover my own path, but as we walk together along this journey of discovery and growth it is my goal to provide you with the needed support to maximize your potential. I am passionate about serving and professional development, not only in my work, but in my spare time as well. I am an active member of Toastmaster’s International in Houston’s District 56 where I have held leadership roles at the club and district level, and I volunteer with the National Hemophilia Foundation’s Ethics Working Group and the Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo.

Stratis is a Professional Certified Coach, accredited by the International Coaching Federation, and a Senior Certified Professional in Human Resources with the Society of Human Resource Management. With over 20 years of experience in Career Coaching, Motivational Psychology, and Leadership, Stratis holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Economics and Employee Relations from the State University of New York at Potsdam, and a Master's Degree in Human Resource Management from Nazareth College in Rochester, NY. Throughout his career, he has held varied roles in training, leadership, and advisement across public, private, non-profit, and government sectors, working with organizations ranging in size from 50 to 50,000 employees, from start-ups to established entities. His focus on intrinsic motivation and work-life balance has empowered employees at all levels, guiding them in aligning their career paths with their individual aspirations and identities.

A passionate professional, loves helping people be a better version of themselves. Suresh leverages his successful leadership experience to partner with individuals and help them gain clarity and step up to a prepared state to better appreciate themselves. As a Certified Coach, Suresh transitioned to run his own coaching and consulting firm from being a Financial & Banking Operations professional. Deeply passionate about his role as a catalyst for change and is fascinated on why people do what they do and what goes on in the 'inside' and into the 'thinking.'

Susan is a certified Career Coach and Talent Strategist with over 15 years experience in talent assessment, learning and development and career coaching. A broad thinker with a strong growth mindset, Susan offers a unique and deep understanding of leadership behaviors, life motivations, corporate insight, and cross-cultural influences. Her approach begins with identifying individual talent and then utilizing a strategic method to help individuals embrace motivations and inherent strengths as they embark on their career journeys. Throughout her career, Susan has helped build talent strategies and learning cultures within several industries, including Fintech, Business Consulting, Advertising, Banking, and Insurance. Susan’s specialties include: • Identifying career aspirations • Building clarity and developing confidence • Leading with authenticity and purpose • Establishing effective relationships within the workplace • Fostering professional resilience • Navigating power and influence • Planning for the future

Tali is a personal coach, career development coach and a senior HR professional. She has 20 years of experience in HR management roles in the tech industry, focusing on employee’s personal and professional development, organizational learning & development, talents acquisition processes and supporting employees and managers during the employment cycle, always in a fast-paced changing environments. She has a degree in Psychology and certifications in personal and occupational coaching, career counseling and positive psychology. Tali is highly passionate about helping professionals, at all career levels, navigating their challenges and dilemmas in the workplace, coaching them to reveal their talents, set clear goals and proactively strive towards them in order to fulfill their high potential.

MS-Administrative Leadership, Higher Education, BA-Communication, Certified Master of Career Services, Certified Workforce Development Professional, and Certified Professional Resume Writer. Tanisha has over 10 years of experience coaching professionals from various backgrounds such as Healthcare, IT, Business, Sales, Higher Education, Education, Law, and Non-profit; ranging from entry level to senior level executives. In addition to coaching Tanisha facilitates workshops and webinars on topics such as professional development, goals, and self-care. She believes in providing a balance of challenge, and support to promote accountability, clarity, and continued growth. Tanisha prides herself on making sure every individual she collaborates with receives a personal coaching experience that fits their needs.

Tanya brings 17 years of experience in Human Resources specifically in Talent Acquisition, Talent Management and Learning & Development. In her journey working on Leadership development programs, she had the opportunity to work with aspiring leaders of the Asia organization, coaching them through their own aspirations and challenges. In 2019, she had formalized her passion in coaching by going through a coaching certification course and followed up by completing her ICF - ACC in 2020

Tara is a true employee advocate and is passionate about driving positive workplace experiences through 1:1 coaching and culture consulting. She’s spent the last 17 years as a career coach, HR leader, and consultant, and has worked in a variety of industries, including tech, higher education, fashion retail, and financial services. Tara spearheads her own culture communications consultancy, where she helps start-up leaders reimagine the employee experience through human-centered, authentic, and inclusive communications. Prior to consulting, Tara held global leadership roles in Employee Experience, Corporate Social Responsibility, and Career Development with organizations such as Etsy, Bloomingdale’s, and Columbia University. As a coach, Tara enjoys helping her clients tap into their inner wisdom and confidence in order to develop meaningful solutions that drive progress towards their goals.

Thais is an Intercultural Trainer & Consultant, Executive Coach (ICF - ACC) for Individuals & Global Teams, and Diversity and Inclusion Facilitator. She has extensive international professional experience in teaching, training, coaching, and marketing in corporate and educational settings obtained through living and working in various geographies including Canada, Cote d'Ivoire, France, Portugal, US, and Venezuela. Her mission is to support individuals, leaders, and team members to unlock and maximize their potential including recognizing the hidden influence that culture has on working, managing, and leading in a global business context. Thais holds an M.B.A from the University of Texas at Dallas, a B.S. in Marketing and Management from the University of South Carolina, an Executive Coaching Certificate from New York University (NYU), a Diversity and Inclusion Certificate from Cornell, and a Certificate in Intercultural Studies from the University of British Columbia. She is fluent in English, French, Spanish, and conversational Portuguese.

Tina is a talented and experienced trilingual certified Life & Relationship coach. In addition to being a Communication expert and a Media personality with over 25yrs in the TV business, Tina holds an PCC accreditation by the ICF, is on the Board of Directors and heads the Marketing committee. She’s also a Certified Clear Beliefs Coach, NLP Coach and Practitioner as well as a Certified Hypnotherapist. Her passion lies in supporting individuals going through change & transition, move past challenges and create success in their personal and professional lives.

Ulla is passionate about the changing requirements to careers, leadership and strategy in the future of work. In relation to this, how to navigate uncertainty in a resilient way. As a certified coach (PCC), she has extensive experience in supporting all levels of professionals through challenges, transformation and to greater self-awareness. She brings 15 years of experience from the multinational corporate world, including within IP, business development, leadership and employee advisory. Ulla combines strategic understanding with empathy, intuition and a pinch of humor. Based in Luxembourg, Ulla is of Finnish-Swedish origin. She holds a Master’s degree of Politics from the University of Aarhus, Denmark.

As a Certified Executive Coach, Vanessa brings over 10+ years of experience coaching leaders on embracing the “both and” of life and leadership to unlock greater possibilities. She coaches leaders on how to have fulfilling relationships while driving results and how to fully accept themselves while also pushing themselves. She’s helped build learning cultures and coached top executives at places like Dow Jones, The Wall Street Journal, Avon, McCann Worldgroup, Momentum Worldwide, and Tinuiti. She is obsessed with personal growth, and loves fitness, hiking, meditating, reading, listening to podcasts, cooking, volunteering, and traveling.

VaTonya’s career has been centered around supporting internal and external stakeholders through organizational transformation and cultural change. She brings over 15 years’ experience in the areas of human resources business partnership, talent development and diversity, equity, inclusion and belonging. She uses this experience to partner with and coach aspiring and established leaders and executives through leadership, career, and personal development challenges and opportunities. She has worked with small to large organizations in both the private and public sector across various industries including professional services, technology, healthcare and, insurance. VaTonya is passionate about coaching clients to accomplish career and personal goals and specifically enjoys working with parents and caregivers.

Virginie started her career as a Moscow-based reporter and an investigative journalist, then switched to academia in the US. For over two decades, she has been a strategic communicator and a member of two executive committees in two different organizations. She founded a non-profit, focusing on sustainability, ethics and good governance. As a Bravely Pro, she can coach in English, French, and Russian. She loves coaching employees at every stage of their career, from entry level to the C-suite.

Winnie is a certified coach since 2016 dedicated to help individuals find possibilities and excel in their professional life. She helps clients navigate through their career challenges, including leading teams, networking, setting goals and finding motivation, with the aim to achieve their organizational and personal goals. Additionally, she delivers group workshops on career development, design thinking, life planning and communication skills, etc. In 2022, Winnie co-founded 30 Matters, a platform supporting working women in their 30s to make authentic decisions for themselves through coaching and experiential workshops. Winnie is ACC (International Coach Federation, ICF), Certified Professional Co-active Coach, NLP Master Practitioner and Master Coach, Everything DiSC® Trainer and certified image consultant. She was also trained by Google's Head of Coaching and ICF’s Co-Founder.

Wissam El Khatib has over 23 years of in-depth experience in Management, Business Development and Sales across various industries. He has held senior managerial positions with multinational firms and local family businesses across the Middle East region. Inspired by his personal life and professional career he joined the coaching industry and holds an ACC accreditation from the ICF and is a certified John Maxwell Team Trainer and Speaker. Wissam is an advocate of Positive Psychology, Emotional Intelligence and Imagery and is proud to be affiliated with Bravely.

Xiangping has more than 10 years of HR experiences in Fortune 500 companies in Beijing and Hong Kong. She also worked with several startup owners and family business owners. With a passion for helping people find their inner peace and achieve their goals, she settled down with her dream job as a career coach after her MBA program. She studied and lived several countries, and learned that every culture has its beauty and uniqueness. She is also interested in conflict resolution in various relationships.

Yennie Rautenberg-Loya is a bilingual (Spanish/English) and multicultural ICF-certified and EQ-certified leadership coach with 25+ years of global experience in corporate and executive communications and program management, and 10+ years delivering life and executive coaching and training programs. Her passion is to empower and develop leaders from underrepresented groups to flourish and leave a positive mark in the world. She enables teams and individuals to build inclusive and collaborative work environments where everyone experiences a sense of belonging, is empowered to participate and has equal opportunity to thrive. She has championed, participated and served as an ally of multiple inclusion and diversity initiatives, and collaborated with teams in 25+ countries.
